issue.title: DRCSim 3.1.1 update via apt no longer loads robot models

content.raw:
Sorry my bad. I'm releasing drcsim-3.1.1-2 which should fix the problem.

Meanwhile, as a workaround could you try:
```
cd /opt/ros/$ROS_DISTRO/share/drcsim_model_resources/gazebo_models/environments/
sudo ln -s ../../../atlas_description .
sudo ln -s ../../../irobot_hand_description .
sudo ln -s ../../../multisense_sl_description .
```
or even
```
export GAZEBO_MODEL_PATH=$GAZEBO_MODEL_PATH:/opt/ros/${ROS_DISTRO}/share/
```
should work.
